hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Monday Red - Fruits for Healthy Life
hiveArticle.body:
In India when people do fasting they usually eat fruits and vegetables. If you see its actually good to have one meal in a week as a fruit diet because it will remove the toxic things from your body and makes your body feel light.

![IMG_20180223_151858.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1519641999/zomagzyo2wvkybi9oxlb.jpg)

### Camera : Nokia 6
